name: Taking Bree Out
description:
Taking Bree Out

A short dating sim based on breakout. Hit the red or green bricks with the ball to select a dialog option. Multiple brick bounces without hitting the paddle will add multipliers to the strength of the next brick break. Try to get to all the different endings!

Controls:

Left and Right Arrows

Unfortunately there is no sound. And the game maaaaaay not be beatable. I didn't have a chance to test the whole thing before submitting. Once you reach and ending, refresh the page to try again. There's no retry button at the moment.

If you're having problems with the web version, download the Windows edition and try again.

Credits:
Art: AlpineShowtime, UgeKyle
Programming: UgeKyle
